thread.section_title: The Logo Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Boutique | www.thelogoboutique.com
thread.title: Tameka Holmes
thread.title_full: The Logo Boutique reviewed by Tameka Holmes

author: Tameka Holmes
title: Tameka Holmes
text: I shopped several sites before choosing The Logo Boutique for a new logo. I decided to take a chance on them because they were offering a great special at the time (New Year's Eve) and I liked their logo gallery. I was pleasantly surprised at how awesome my logo and business card designs turned out and Monica Telpis, my project manager, was very helpful since I can be very picky. She was patient with me until I got my design exactly how I envisioned it. Thank you so much. I will be using their services again and I will refer others them for sure!
